MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH6 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Ashley Place and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.27pm. Our engineers have arrived at Ashley Place substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:33PM on Thursday 05 November 2020.
